reviewText: First, lets say I love the series, the show is not why I rated it so low. The rating comes from the fact it didn't work in my Blu-Ray player and at this point, I still haven't received my refund after returning the discs, but hey it has only been 8 weeks.
I can't say this about many show but I could watch it over and over again and never get sick of it. It's like Rick Steve's with a seance of humor

Shipped fast, great quality. Live in the US. Blu-ray Disc did not play on PS3, however; NEW LG blu-ray players have built in converters making it playable. This information is not presented on the box, but is found when you research a bit online. Hope this helps others in the US with playing Region B discs and saves you some money.
Great, money down the drain. You really need to make it VERY VERY clear that this blu ray collection DOES NOT WORK IN AMERICA! Very very upsetting!!!

Had seen notices about versions for DVD's that were only good for specific regions.  Saw no notices about blue ray discs.  Nothing was specified about this series and it DOES NOT play on blue ray players in the states.  Complete waste for me.

it does not work on m blu ray player or playstation3, apparently thier is a "region" difference i was not notified about. If you have my address and its in the u.s. don't you think maybe you should say something about it?
